question:
With reference to the Administrative Tribunals in India, consider the following statements:
1. Central Government is empowered to abolish the Tribunal or any of its Benches
2. Any person aggrieved by any decision or order of the Tribunal may file an appeal to the High Court
Which among the above is / are correct statements?
explanation: This question is based on Administrative Tribunals (Amendment) Bill which was introduced some years ago but has not passed. Read here about it in some detail. http://goo.gl/hQ5zcj
